name: cvs-svc-authoriser
description: Lambda authoriser for validating a user's Azure AD JWT and generating an access policy.

scripts.build: node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --rootDir ./ --outDir build --sourceMap false && npm run build:copy && npm run build:install
scripts.build:copy: cp package.json package-lock.json build && cd src && find ./**/*.yml | cpio -pdm ../build
scripts.package: cd build && mkdir config && cd config && touch config.yml && cd ../ && cp -r package.json package-lock.json config src/ && cd src && npm ci --production && rm package.json package-lock.json && zip -qr ../../${ZIP_NAME}.zip .
scripts.prepush: BRANCH=local npm test && npm run tslint
scripts.sonar-scanner: npm run tslint && npm run coverage && sonar-scanner

hooks.pre-commit: npm run prepush && npm run security-checks
